latest_revision.comment:
Leather Weld by Eco-Flo.  This is a water-based adhesive.
Used to bond two pieces of leather along a stitch line.  This will occur either before holes are made with stitching chisels, *or* after that step and before stitching occurs.
latest_revision.text:
Leather Weld by Eco-Flo.  This is a water-based adhesive.
Used to bond two pieces of leather along a stitch line.  This will occur either before holes are made with stitching chisels, *or* after that step and before stitching occurs.
